attributes.review: I downloaded this app for updates on our President Trumpâ€™s campaign. My phone was completely fine before downloading it. After using the app, my phone was glitching and the screen was freezing. I really wanted to use this app, but unfortunately, I donâ€™t think itâ€™s worth it. attributes.review: I genuinely canâ€™t believe how poorly this app runs it is infuriating to use and also glitches and shutdowns and makes my phone start acting weird. attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!

attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps I have downloaded, it had so many glitches that I couldnâ€™t even use it. Apparently this happens to a few people, I learned that from reading the reviews, but I guessed it wouldnâ€™t happen to me because it was only a few people. attributes.title: Too Many Glitches

attributes.review: THIS APP IS TERRIBLE!!! As a certified Karen, we do not claim this app. It kept on saying Trump 2020 BUT I DID NOT WANT THAT. So I called the manager and guess what they said... they said â€œcalm downâ€ CALM DOWN?!? CALM DOWN?!?!?!! I WILL NOT CONDONE THIS TYPE OF BEHAVIOR IN AN APP THAT PEOPLE HAVE USED! Then I wondered who in the HELL put the muffins in the freezer, but then I realized... IT WAS THE MANAGER. THE MANAGER PUT THE MUFFINS IN THE FREEZER. I STILL DONâ€™T UNDERSTAND WHY IT SAID â€œTrump2020â€ ON THE FRONT OF IT. I WANTED IT TO SAY â€œSettle for Biden 2020â€. Needless to say, this app is terrible I would not recommend it to anyone.
